title: This Is What You Need To Know Before Self-Publishing Your Book On Amazon KDP - Low Content Books
description:
In this video, I’m going to share 12 things that you need to know before using Amazon KDP to self-publish your books, so make sure to watch this video until the end before you hit publish on your book to make sure KDP and self-publishing is right for you.
